articles.title: Why used cars are becoming the smarter choice for Indian buyers
articles.summary: India's used car market is booming, increasingly becoming the smarter choice for buyers nationwide. This surge is driven by heightened affordability, making car ownership more accessible, alongside the convenience offered by robust digital platforms. The trend reflects evolving consumer preferences and economic dynamics within India, indicating a significant shift in the automotive sector's purchasing landscape.

articles.title: Assam Police Recruitment 2025 notification for 4000 vacancies releasing soon: Check where to register, selection process details here
articles.summary: The Assam Police will soon release a notification for 4000 vacancies in its 2025 recruitment drive. This offers a significant career opportunity for SSB aspirants in law enforcement and public service. Details on registration, eligibility, and the selection process will be available shortly. Aspirants should monitor official Assam Police channels for timely updates and prepare thoroughly for this state-level recruitment.

articles.title: CBSE limits second Class 10 Board Exam attempt for these students in 2026: Check details here
articles.summary: CBSE has announced a significant change for Class 10 Board exams starting in 2026. Students who fail to pass the first attempt will now be limited to only one subsequent second attempt to clear the exam. This new rule aims to streamline the examination process and encourage students to perform well in their initial attempts, impacting lakhs of aspirants nationwide.

articles.title: Russia downs 33 Ukrainian drones overnight, defence ministry says
articles.summary: The Russian Defence Ministry reported intercepting and destroying 33 Ukrainian drones overnight across five Russian regions, Crimea, and the Black Sea. This significant drone attack highlights ongoing military tensions and active aerial engagements in the conflict zone, underscoring the persistent threat of unmanned aerial vehicles in modern warfare.

articles.title: TN TET 2025 held for 3.75 lakh candidates: Teachers demand cut-off reduction to 50%, details here
articles.summary: Teachers' federations in Tamil Nadu are demanding a 50% cut-off reduction for the TN TET 2025, in which 3.75 lakh candidates participated. This initiative seeks to enhance recruitment prospects for aspiring educators, addressing concerns over existing qualification thresholds. The demand reflects ongoing debates within state education policy on making teacher recruitment more accessible and effective.

articles.title: Zelensky receives US plan to end war in Ukraine and expects talks with Trump
articles.summary: Ukrainian President Zelensky has received a draft US plan aimed at resolving the war in Ukraine. He anticipates upcoming discussions with former US President Donald Trump on this proposal. This development underscores ongoing international diplomatic efforts to find a peaceful resolution to the conflict, involving key global figures in potential peace initiatives and negotiations.

articles.title: Zelensky receives draft US plan to end war in Ukraine and expects talks with Trump
articles.summary: Ukrainian President Zelensky has received a draft US peace plan aimed at ending the war in Ukraine. His office announced that Zelensky anticipates holding talks with former US President Donald Trump in the coming days to discuss the proposal. This development highlights ongoing international diplomatic efforts to find a resolution to the prolonged conflict.

articles.title: Brian Cashman confident Yankees have cash flexibility despite $300M max
articles.summary: Yankees owner Hal Steinbrenner is currently deliberating the team's 2026 payroll, particularly its sustainable limit. He has expressed reservations about the feasibility of maintaining a budget potentially exceeding $300 million. While the precise final figure remains his decision, Steinbrenner's emphasis on financial sustainability will be a key factor in determining the Yankees' future spending.

articles.title: Earthquake of magnitude 5.2 jolts Pakistan; more tremors recorded this week
articles.summary: A Putin aide heavily criticized France's substantial $23 billion arms deal with Kyiv, alleging that Ukrainian President Zelensky is personally profiting from the significant military aid. This sharp condemnation highlights ongoing international tensions and accusations of corruption regarding military support amidst the conflict, emphasizing a propaganda battle surrounding aid transparency and leadership integrity.

articles.title: Blue Jays stay competitive, drop in state tourney quarterfinals
articles.summary: Jamestown High School's volleyball team achieved a significant upset by winning the first set against Fargo Davies in the Class AA NDHSAA State Tournament quarterfinals. The team, displaying confidence, felt they had the capability to secure a quick victory in just three sets, indicating a strong performance and strategic edge in the ongoing state-level competition.

articles.title: New research uncovers hidden divide in West Coast killer whales
articles.summary: Recent research reveals that transient killer whales along the West Coast, spanning British Columbia to California, are not a single group but comprise two distinct subpopulations. These newly identified 'inner' and 'outer' groups highlight specialized ecological roles and behaviors, offering crucial insights for conservation strategies and understanding marine biodiversity. This discovery refines our knowledge of these apex predators.

articles.title: Dubai Air Show 2025: 'India is a strategic priority for us,' says US tech firm SAIC's top officer
articles.summary: US-based Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC), a major tech solutions provider, has declared India a "strategic priority." SAIC's Chief Growth Officer, Murtaza Ahmed, indicated a strong intent to focus on the Indian market. This underscores India's increasing appeal for global corporations in strategic technology and business domains, potentially fostering enhanced collaboration in key sectors.

articles.title: Taiwan issues ‘crisis’ guide on preparing for disasters, Chinese attack
articles.summary: Taiwan is distributing a crisis manual to its residents, preparing them for emergencies like natural disasters and potential invasion. This move reflects the island's heightened awareness of geopolitical tensions, especially with China. The manual aims to equip citizens with essential survival information, underscoring Taiwan's proactive approach to national resilience and defense preparedness.

articles.title: Yankees fan goes viral for throwing visceral Aaron Judge and Gerrit Cole accusation at Brian Cashman
articles.summary: A Yankees fan recently gained significant online attention after making a highly emotional and impactful accusation concerning star players Aaron Judge and Gerrit Cole. The fan directed these serious claims at Brian Cashman, the team's General Manager. This incident, reported by The Sporting News, quickly went viral across social media platforms.

articles.title: Familiar rival stands in Gotham FC’s way once again in their bid for NWSL title

This signals ongoing diplomatic efforts and military coordination between Ukraine and the United States amidst the prolonged war.

This clearance follows New Delhi's pressing request for these acquisitions in the aftermath of 'Operation Sindoor'. The deal significantly enhances India's defensive capabilities and strategic preparedness, underscoring the deepening defence cooperation between Washington and New Delhi amidst evolving regional security challenges.

Essential for lithium-ion batteries, this initiative aims to strengthen the U.S. supply chain for critical energy materials. While promising, significant output is expected gradually, reflecting a strategic, phased approach to resource development.

articles.title: Missing Endangered Person Alert issued for Wisconsin woman last seen in May 2025, concern for well-being

This alert signifies serious concerns for her safety, prompting law enforcement to seek public assistance. Such alerts highlight critical mechanisms for locating vulnerable individuals, underscoring their importance for national public safety.

This modern venue is central to a massive redevelopment project aimed at revitalizing the area. The initiative promises significant urban infrastructure development and potential economic uplift, marking a major investment in the region's future sports and community facilities.

articles.title: NWSL Awards Presented By AT&T Celebrate Rising Stars And League Growth
articles.summary: The 2025 NWSL Awards, presented by AT&T, are scheduled for November 19, 2025, in San Jose, California. Hosted by Jordan Angeli at the Montgomery Theater, this event will celebrate achievements within the National Women's Soccer League. It marks an annual recognition of excellence in professional women's football in the United States, highlighting key players and contributors.

articles.title: News 11/21/25
articles.summary: Ruthia He, founder and CEO of the ADHD-prescribing telehealth platform Done, has been convicted on federal charges. These include illegally distributing Adderall, committing healthcare claims fraud, and conspiring to obstruct justice. This case underscores the rigorous regulatory scrutiny faced by telehealth companies, especially regarding controlled substance prescriptions, and highlights the legal accountability for executives in this evolving industry.

This move aims to further develop one of DC's vaunted superhero teams.

articles.title: Kashmir Times office in Jammu searched over alleged links to secessionist plot

This action underscores India's proactive stance against groups suspected of undermining national integrity and security. articles.title: Talk to Centre to stop harassment of Kashmiris across India, Mehbooba urges Omar
articles.summary: Former J&K CM Mehbooba Mufti urged Omar Abdullah to engage with the central government to address reported harassment and profiling of Kashmiris nationwide. The plea highlights concerns over the safety and fair treatment of Kashmiri citizens across various parts of India. This emphasizes the need for federal intervention to ensure their protection and prevent discriminatory practices amidst ongoing tensions, underscoring issues of national integration and citizen rights.

articles.title: Russia's alleged hybrid warfare targeting seafloor cables vital to modern life
articles.summary: Over 95% of global internet and voice communication traffic relies on an extensive network of fiber optic cables laid across ocean floors. These critical undersea cables are the backbone of modern digital connectivity, essential for international communication and economies. Their vast reach underscores their strategic importance and potential vulnerabilities, demanding global attention for their security.

articles.title: DAVE THE DIVER now available for Xbox Series and Xbox One; physical edition announced for PS5 and Switch 2
articles.summary: MINTROCKET has officially launched its single-player adventure RPG, "DAVE THE DIVER," for the Xbox Series. The game is now accessible through the Microsoft Store for Xbox console users. Additionally, PC players can acquire the title via the Microsoft Store, expanding its availability across major gaming platforms, following its existing release on other platforms.

articles.title: Lanterns Release Date Window Delayed for DCU HBO TV Show
articles.summary: The highly anticipated HBO Original drama series 'Lanterns,' developed by DC Studios, has officially had its release date postponed. The delay was announced during a press presentation by Casey Bloys, Chairman and CEO of HBO and HBO Max Content, confirming a setback for the upcoming superhero-themed production and its streaming schedule.

articles.title: Lanterns’ Schedule Push Might Be Good News For Fans of Cosmic DC
articles.summary: Early buzz surrounding the upcoming 'Lanterns' series, based on the cosmic Green Lantern concept, has surprisingly focused entirely on terrestrial aspects. Despite the inherent cosmic nature of the source material, James Gunn's initial announcement and subsequent discussions indicate a grounded initial reception or narrative direction. This signals a potentially unique approach to adapting the iconic science fiction property for a new audience.

articles.title: Plans for Birmingham City's 62,000-seater stadium revealed
articles.summary: Birmingham City Football Club, based in the West Midlands, has unveiled plans for a major new 62,000-capacity stadium. The club's ambitious goal is to have this state-of-the-art facility completed and ready for the start of the 2030/2031 football season. This significant infrastructure development highlights Birmingham City's long-term vision and investment in its sporting future.

articles.title: Brady, Bellingham hail Birmingham's new stadium

This significant development aims to propel the second-division club and the city onto a "trajectory towards greatness," signifying a major infrastructure investment.
